scores.note: Boot fallback and entry hero clearly communicate product value.
Core and engine nav suppress primary CTA by default.
Hero variant structure is differentiated (focused header, analytical table).
Back button, breadcrumb and loading progress are implemented.
Motion policy checks pass and reduced-motion safeguards exist.
Bundle budget and route splitting are in place; font delivery still needs hardening.
Proof and governance cues are consistently present.
Hero copy is concise; page-level microcopy can still be tightened.
Loading/error/success/empty patterns are covered with reusable components.
A11y structure and smoke checks pass in CI.
PWA verification and offline support are wired.
Visual identity is strong while maintaining calm interaction.

issues.symptom: Primary intent can feel split between hero and secondary action groups under some content states.
issues.fixHypothesis: Enforce one prominent primary CTA above the fold for P0 routes and demote any other action to ghost/minor.

issues.symptom: Focused/analytical families are improved but still visually close in dense layouts.
issues.fixHypothesis: Increase semantic separation via role-specific spacing and metadata hierarchy in hero blocks.

issues.symptom: Font definitions are prepared but public/fonts currently lacks hosted font binaries.
issues.fixHypothesis: Add self-hosted WOFF2 assets for primary families and preload critical weights.

issues.symptom: Motion allowlist still permits legacy infinite decorative animations.
issues.fixHypothesis: Reduce motion-policy allowlist and gate decorative loops behind explicit opt-in classes.

issues.symptom: Structure checks pass, but route-by-route visual contrast and keyboard walkthrough snapshots are not yet archived.
issues.fixHypothesis: Record manual keyboard and contrast verification artifacts for all P0 routes.
